concept_definition: toward or in the direction of the North Pole; northward (e.g., "go north", "facing north").
toward or in the direction of the South Pole; southward (e.g., "go south", "heading south").
toward or in the direction where the sun rises; eastward (e.g., "go east", "traveling east").
toward or in the direction where the sun sets; westward (e.g., "go west", "moving west").
toward or on the right side; in the direction of one's right hand (e.g., "turn right", "look right").
